incidents.name: High pipeline lag flex-queue-stats

incident_updates.body: Banner: Twilio flex-queue-stats  was degraded for 13 minutes between 15:42 and 15:55 Pacific Time. During this period of time customers may have experienced delays in viewing real time queue stats on supervisor views in Flex. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Connectivity Lost on 10% of Super SIM Devices

incident_updates.body: We will close the post on Twilio's Status Page. If you have been impacted by this incident and wish to continue to receive updates, please open a ticket with customer support.

We have observed that the recent impact was limited to devices connected over AT&T. Currently, we are monitoring the situation as approximately 3% of devices may still experience connectivity issues. These devices might encounter a poor data connection or have short-lived sessions.
Our engineering team is actively working alongside the affected network provider to resolve the issue as quickly as possible. In the meantime, we kindly suggest that customers reset the connectivity through the console if they notice that some of their SIM cards are still experiencing issues. This can often help re-establish a stable connection for the affected devices. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are still experiencing Super SIM data sessions issues. Devices that attempted to reconnect immediately after losing connectivity should have been able to successfully reconnect to the redundant instances while the impacted one recovered. We will continue to monitor and will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are observing improvement in Connectivity Lost on devices active data sessions on Super SIM. Devices that attempted to reconnect immediately after losing connectivity should have been able to successfully reconnect to the redundant instances while the impacted one recovered. We will continue to monitor to ensure full service recovery. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Devices that attempted to reconnect immediately after losing connectivity should have been able to successfully reconnect to the redundant instances while the impacted one recovered. We will continue to monitor and will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Beginning at 02:16 UTC, we observed around 10% of active data sessions on Super SIM being dropped. we are investigating an issue where devices using Super SIM may experience the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Workflow Orchestration Tool is Unavailable in US1 Region Impacting Multiple Services

incident_updates.body: The issue has been resolved and the affected components identified is operating normally at this time.

The identified potential issue is mitigated at the moment and we continue to monitor the issue along with affected components. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

We have identified a potential service / tool issue with US1 impacting multiple services. Customers might experience delay in receiving Email confirmation for the payments, notifications on the status of certificates, quick deployment of workflows, performing short code to long code translations in Voice, Voice intelligence transcripts. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available

incidents.name: Connectivity Lost on 4% of Super SIM Devices

incident_updates.body: The issue with Super SIM data sessions has been resolved and services are operating normally at this time. This incident has now been resolved

Devices that attempted to reconnect immediately after losing connectivity should have been able to successfully reconnect to the redundant instances while the impacted one recovered. We will continue to monitor. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Beginning at 08:18 UTC we observed 4% of active data sessions on Super SIM being dropped. We are investigating an issue where devices using Super SIM may experience the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Beginning at 08:18 UTC we observed 4% of active data sessions on Super SIM being dropped. We are investigating an issue where devices using Super SIM may experience the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS and MMS Delivery Delays to AT&T in the US

incident_updates.body: We are no longer experiencing MMS and SMS delivery delays when sending messages over short codes, long codes, and toll-free numbers to AT&T in the US, nor message delivery failures and cases where messages may have arrived with a sender format that deviates from the standard +1 E.164. This incident has been resolved.

incidents.name: Twilio Console JP1 Access Errors

incident_updates.body: Twilio console was degraded for 8 days between May 10th 2023, 3:19:41 AM and May 18, 3:23 AM Pacific Time. During this period of time customers may have experienced error messages when trying to login to the console using https://jp.twilio.com/login/kddi-web. The alternate domain https://www.twilio.com/login/kddi-web was working correctly. The issue has now been resolved.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Twilio console access. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.
